title: Node.js路径穿越与哈希拒绝服务攻击漏洞威胁Windows应用
title_translated: Node.js' route through and Hash's denial of service attacks threatens Windows applications
summary: Two high-risk loopholes were repaired in Node.js 24.x, 22.x and 20.x versions. These loopholes allow attackers to bypass directory protection mechanisms on Windows platforms and exploit path standardization defects.

title: 微软 Office 漏洞允许攻击者执行远程代码
title_translated: Microsoft Office bug allows the assailant to execute remote code
summary: Several key loopholes in Microsoft Office may allow attackers to enforce random codes on affected systems.

title: Wing FTP Server Improper Neutralization of Null Byte or NUL Character Vulnerability
title_translated: Wing FTP Server Improper Neutralization of Null Byte or NUL Character Vulnerability
summary: Wing FTP Server contains an improper neutralization of null byte or NUL character vulnerability that can allow injection of arbitrary Lua code into user session files, leading to execution of arbitrary system commands with the privileges of the FTP service.

title: Ubuntu: (CVE-2025-7345): gdk-pixbuf vulnerability
summary: A heap buffer overflow can occur during Base64 encoding of maliciously crafted JPEG images, potentially causing application crashes or arbitrary code execution.

title: Ubuntu: (CVE-2025-6395): gnutls28 vulnerability
summary: A NULL pointer dereference flaw was found in GnuTLS software, allowing an attacker to cause memory corruption and denial of service.
